item.title: NOK
item.description: score:-15 Chances: Nokia’s patent portfolio and recent licensing deals demonstrate the company’s strength in intellectual property and potential for continued revenue growth. The Cloud and Network Services segment’s focus on cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models positions Nokia to capitalize on the increasing demand for critical networks.
